title: Google\Cloud\Datastore\V1\ReadOptions
name: ReadOptions
description:
The options shared by read requests.

Generated from protobuf message google.datastore.v1.ReadOptions

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.transaction
params.description: The identifier of the transaction in which to read. A transaction identifier is returned by a call to [Datastore.BeginTransaction][google.datastore.v1.Datastore.BeginTransaction].

params.name: data.read_time
params.description: Reads entities as they were at the given time. This may not be older than 270 seconds. This value is only supported for Cloud Firestore in Datastore mode.

methods.name: getReadConsistency
methods.description:
The non-transactional read consistency to use.
